short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily summarize articles with a click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the AISum Browser Extension - Your Efficient News Digest!

Stay up-to-date with the latest news without the overwhelming information overload. The AISum Browser Extension offers a streamlined solution for those seeking quick, comprehensive summaries of news articles. Designed to save you time and enhance your news reading experience, this extension condenses lengthy articles into concise, informative snippets, all in a matter of seconds.

Features:

Instant Summaries: Get the core details of any news article within 10 to 40 seconds, depending on the article length. Our advanced summarization algorithm efficiently analyzes the content and generates a coherent summary that covers the key points.

Selective Compatibility: While we aim to support as many websites as possible, due to the varying structures of news articles on the web, the extension may not work seamlessly on all sites. However, we constantly strive to expand our compatibility list and enhance the extension's capabilities.

User-Friendly Interface: Our extension seamlessly integrates into your browser, ensuring a hassle-free user experience. With just a click, you can access concise summaries that provide essential information without the need to scan through lengthy articles.

Customizable Experience: Tailor the extension to suit your preferences. Adjust the summarization length and level of detail according to your needs, ensuring that you receive summaries that match your reading style.

Free of Charge: We believe that staying informed shouldn't come at a cost. The AISum Browser Extension is available for free, so you can enjoy its benefits without any financial burden.

Privacy Matters: We respect your privacy. Our extension doesn't store your personal information or reading habits, ensuring that your online experience remains private and secure.

Regular Updates: Our dedicated team is committed to improving and expanding the extension's capabilities. Expect regular updates that bring enhancements, new features, and increased compatibility with various news websites.

Whether you're a busy professional trying to catch up on the latest news during a coffee break or a curious individual who wants to stay informed without spending excessive time reading, the AISum Browser Extension is your reliable companion. Embrace efficiency in news consumption and download the extension today to transform your browsing experience.

Please note that due to the dynamic nature of the internet, there may be occasional challenges with summarizing articles from certain websites. We appreciate your understanding as we work to enhance the extension's compatibility over time.
